page.title: 15MRS SCOTT
page.content: Mrs Scott, born on 2nd July 1901 in South Myre of Sanday Island, has never left Orkney in her life. She went to Cross School in the South End of Sanday which is opposite South Myre where she lived. After leaving school she worked as a servant at Stove along with 42 others, then at Backaskaill. When she was 22 years old she went to Kirkwall where again she worked as a maid in various places for another nine years. When she came back to Sanday in 1931 she married John Scott, a tenant at Stove which in 1921 was split into nine holdings with tenants for each. In 1972 there was a fire at Stove which burnt out most of the buildings and ruined the farm. On February 19th 1980 Mrs Scott's husband died. She is now 84 years old and has her 36 cats for company.
